TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AreaAlignmentOrientations extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the alignment orientation of a chart area.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The AreaAlignmentOrientations enumeration represents the physical orientation, such as vertical or horizontal, of a chart area.
In contrast, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentStyles> enumeration represents the chart elements, such as the cursor or inner plot position, which can be used to align a chart area.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentOrientations All = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Chart areas are aligned horizontally and vertically.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentOrientations Horizontal = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentOrientations None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Chart areas are not automatically aligned.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentOrientations Vertical = int32(1)
